302-1.name: Energy consumption within the organization
302-1.calculation: Fuel + electricity + heating + cooling in gigajoules

302-2.name: Energy consumption outside the organization
302-2.definition: Upstream and downstream energy use in value chain

302-3.name: Energy intensity
302-3.definition: Energy per unit of activity or output
302-3.calculation: Total energy / revenue or production volume

302-4.name: Reduction of energy consumption
302-4.definition: Energy saved through efficiency and conservation initiatives
302-4.calculation: Baseline energy - current energy after initiatives

302-5.name: Reduction in energy requirements of products
302-5.definition: Energy reductions achieved in sold products and services
302-5.calculation: Previous product energy - current product energy

305-1.name: Direct (Scope 1) GHG emissions
305-1.definition: Gross direct GHG emissions in metric tons CO2e
305-1.calculation: Direct emissions from owned or controlled sources

305-3.name: Other indirect (Scope 3) GHG emissions
305-3.definition: All other indirect emissions across value chain

305-4.name: GHG emissions intensity
305-4.definition: GHG emissions per unit of activity or output
305-4.calculation: Total GHG / revenue or production volume

305-5.name: Reduction of GHG emissions
305-5.calculation: Baseline emissions - current emissions after initiatives

303-1.name: Interactions with water as a shared resource
303-1.definition: Description of water-related impacts and management approach
303-1.calculation: Narrative on water risks, policies, and stakeholders

303-2.name: Management of water discharge-related impacts
303-2.definition: Standards and approach for managing water discharge
303-2.calculation: Discharge quality standards and treatment methods

303-3.name: Water withdrawal
303-3.calculation: All sources including surface, ground, municipal

303-4.name: Water discharge
303-4.definition: Total water discharged by destination and quality
303-4.calculation: Discharge to surface water + groundwater + third party

303-5.name: Water consumption
303-5.definition: Total water consumed across all operations

306-1.name: Waste generation and significant waste-related impacts
306-1.definition: Total waste generated and key waste-related impacts

306-2.name: Management of significant waste-related impacts
306-2.definition: Actions taken to prevent and manage waste
306-2.calculation: Circular economy and waste reduction initiatives

306-3.name: Waste generated
306-3.definition: Total weight of hazardous and non-hazardous waste

306-4.name: Waste diverted from disposal
306-4.definition: Waste recovered through recycling, reuse, or composting

306-5.name: Waste directed to disposal
306-5.definition: Waste sent to landfill, incineration, or deep-well
